params.url: jdbc:oracle:thin:@ (DESCRIPTION = (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = wmsadg01-vip.800best.com)(PORT = 1521)) (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = wmsadg02-vip.800best.com)(PORT = 1521)) (LOAD_BALANCE = yes)(CONNECT_DATA =(SERVER = DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME = wms)(FAILOVER_MODE = (TYPE =SELECT)(METHOD = BASIC) (RETRIES = 180)(DELAY = 5))))
params.groupSql: select distinct g.id, 0 parentId, g.name as name, g.code description from gv_sys_domain g where g.id=:groupId
params.userSql: select distinct u.id, u.domain_id groupId, u.code loginName, u.userName, null sex, null birthday, u.email, u.code employeeNo, 'com.jinhe.tss.um.sso.UMPasswordIdentifier' authMethod from gv_sys_userinfo u where u.status_id=3 and u.usertype_id=448 and u.code like 'BL%' and u.domain_id=:groupId
params.singleUser: select distinct u.id, u.domain_id groupId, u.code loginName, u.userName, null sex, null birthday, u.email, u.code employeeNo, 'com.jinhe.tss.um.sso.UMPasswordIdentifier' authMethod from gv_sys_userinfo u where u.id = :userId
